P

PendingContact - Class in com.jmex.physics.contact
Instances of this class are used to query contact details with the ContactCallback interface.
PHYSICS_NODE_PROPERTY - Static variable in class com.jmex.physics.PhysicsCollisionGeometry
 
PhysicsBox - Class in com.jmex.physics.geometry
Box has a size of (1,1,1) and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation and size via local scale.
PhysicsCapsule - Class in com.jmex.physics.geometry
Capsule has a radius of 1, a height of 1, and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation, radius via local x scale and height via local z scale.
PhysicsCollisionGeometry - Class in com.jmex.physics
Subclasses of this class are used to specify the physical geometry of a PhysicsNode.
PhysicsCylinder - Class in com.jmex.physics.geometry
Cylinder has a radius of 1, a height of 1, and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation, radius via local x scale and height via local z scale.
PhysicsDebugger - Class in com.jmex.physics
Analoguous to Debugger this class can be used to view physics data such as physics collision bounds, velocity and forces.
PhysicsMesh - Class in com.jmex.physics.geometry
A PhysicsMesh can represent any triangle soup that is used a collision geometry.
PhysicsNode - Class in com.jmex.physics
A PhysicsNode defines a physical entity.
PhysicsPicker - Class in com.jmex.physics.util
A small tool to be able to pick the visual of physics nodes and move them around with the mouse.
PhysicsPicker(InputHandler, Node, PhysicsSpace) - Constructor for class com.jmex.physics.util.PhysicsPicker
Constructor of the class.
PhysicsSpace - Class in com.jmex.physics
PhysicsSpace is the central class of the jME Physics API.
PhysicsSphere - Class in com.jmex.physics.geometry
Sphere simply has a radius of 1 and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation and radius via uniform local scale.
PhysicsUpdateCallback - Interface in com.jmex.physics
This class provides a callback for extending the behaviour of the physics.
putContactHandlingDetails(Material, ContactHandlingDetails) - Method in class com.jmex.physics.material.Material
Specify contact details like friction (mu), bouciness etc.
